channel.title: Assignments on PHI 152
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on PHI 152

item.title: Assignment 1
item.description: Upload your page to “Assignment 1” on Blackboard, under the Assignments area (link in the left sidebar) by, at the latest, (anytime on) TBD. Tasks For this exercise, arguments take the form of two or more sentences — with at least three usually making things easier! — the last of which is the conclusion. The phrases in each sentence should fit together. See forallx, Chapter 2 for examples of arguments.
